meanings.definition: A view or prospect, especially one of a landscape or cityscape.
meanings.sent1: The veduta of the city from the hill was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: She admired the detailed veduta of the countryside in the painting.
meanings.sent3: The veduta of the bustling city made her want to explore every corner.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a veduta of memories, each one a different view of his past.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the veduta of the sunset in vibrant colors.
